message.content:
cs.SI, cs.SD, cs.SOC, cs.DM, cs.IT. 

The paper focuses on the progression of trends through (social) networks, which is a topic that falls under the scope of social networks (cs.SI), social and information networks (cs.SD), and social and economic networks (cs.SOC). The paper also uses a random graph model to mimic the progression of a trend through the network, which is a topic that falls under the scope of discrete mathematics (cs.DM) and information theory (cs.IT).
